product_name: Nescafe Classic Coffee, 200g Dawn Jar: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: Coffee Taste : Cafe Grade TasteTechnology: Innovative as we use the product via an appPortability: Very portable. Can be taken to new accommodations or vacations. But don't use this in trains if you are planning to. Not that it won't work, but don't usually use it in train's fluctuating voltage.Price: Some ppl call it very expensive. Well it depends on your usage pattern and liking of the product. I feel it's worth each penny. The only reason being it's an out of the box solution giving u Cafe grade coffee in just 60 secs with great portability.Use cases:1.You can use the item for daily coffee needs.2. You can also make bournvita, hotchocolate, iced Tea, cold coffee, hot coffee inside it.3.Best for gifting purposes.4. Best for making refreshment for guests at home. It's quick and fun to watch by the guest too.Overall: The product has won me over. Let's wait and see if there is another version which arrives. But don't cross think. Just buy it. It's worth it.

reviews.review_title: Honest review of nescafe coffe . ( wastage of coffe batch)
reviews.review_body: Never buy nescafe  coffe from amazon. This is the worst nescafe taste . People attract by lower price . But reality is this is over roasted and wastage quality of nescafe . They sell it by online platform . Tastwise 0/10 .
Bought from Cloudtail India at a great discount. My 200 gram jar contained less granules and more powder than the lighter variants, but the effect is the same.
It's strong and taste really good. Value for money as I bought this from here and alwayz on discount. 1 cup in morning and it'll make up your day
Nescafe Classic has been around for a long time. It's flavor, aroma, kick & taste(whether black or with cream) is just awesome.
Is it really coffee? No flavour or aroma, what is this? Why they sell such spurious product? Is it the problem of Nestle or the seller?
What can you say for a packed product? ðŸ˜‚Criticism will be there if Nestle degrades the quality or I receive opened product in future.For now, keep the good work going Amazon!
I received broken glass coffee bottle
